title: Hello everyone . I would like to be able to identify the characteristics of the type of font and its origins that relate to the flag of the ISI . For a project. Thanks to all of the availability.
author: NaCIO2.5

comments.content:
By Satan's clumsy hand ... ?  
Looks like some of the letters have been decapitated :)  
don
